entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add clear image caching APIs #4766
    Future
  • Span Text cannot be changed #4765
  • VisualElement.Bounds's size does not match IView.Width/Height #4764
  • Flyout margins and settings do not display correctly #4762
  • Blazor Hybrid, not able to link to static resource form RCL project #4760
  • [Android] Maui Blazor, static files from Razor Class Library not included in wwwroot #4758
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #4756
  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #4755
  • Child view size exceeds the parent view size #4749
  • [Windows]Flow direction RTL not working in HorizontalStackLayout #4748
  • Vertical Text of a Label? #4746
  • Add npm support into .NET MAUI Blazor template #4745
  • [Bug] In a Shell enabled App, after traversing to a page defined with the attached property `Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated"` Flyout menu becomes inaccessible #4744
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working for image #4743
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working in Button #4742
  • Do not run sIn file in Visual Studio 2022 for Mac version 17.0 Preview 6 #4741
  • XAML editor no longer working for MAUI library in Preview 13 #4740
  • The splash screen icon (Assets\appiconfgSplashScreen.png) listed in the manifest is not found #4736
  • Images no longer render in Preview 13 #4735
  • Span Gesture doesn't work #4734
  • MAUI WebView is not displaying body background-image #4733

Closed

  • ViewExtensions.GetViewTransform should return transform to root rather than parent #4690
  • [Bug][Template] Add AssemblyInfo.cs to the template #2207
  • [Bug] Border StrokeShape needs typeconverter for XAML #2690
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • VS17.1Prv1: MAUI fails default project build even after updating manually via maui-check & template update #3419
  • Default templates for both blazor and regular won't even compile #4148
  • NRE when typing into Editor on Windows #3477
  • ProgressBar doesn't render on Windows #3479
  • [Bug] Alerts currently don't work if you call them from the constructor #1514
  • [Android] SwipeItemView using a Frame is not rendering correctly #4118
  • [Android] Dynamically adding SwipeItems not render the BackgroundColor correctly #4120
  • CarouselView Do Not Work [Bug] #2225
  • Intent-Filter in AndroidManifest.xml causes build to fail unexpectedly and without error. #4737
  • Fake issue #4703

PullRequests

Created

  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
  • Interfaced handlers for ContentView, DatePicker, Editor #4763
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials Barometer - alternate approach #4761
  • Essentials.WebAuthenticator refactored to interface and singleton #4757
  • Essentials.TextToSpeech refactored to interface and singleton #4747
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Essentials.Clipboard refactored to interface and singleton #4612
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Connectivity refactored to interface and singleton #4622
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4587
    platform/android 🤖, area/a11y
  • Essentials.AppActions refactored to interface and singleton #4596
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [WinUI] Use XamlRoot for GetViewTransform #4689
    partner/ui-tools
  • Remove debug checks #4738
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [templates] define a %(BaseSize) for images #4759
  • [iOS] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4588
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y
  • Add FabricBot rules for s/needs-repro label #4739
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS, Catalyst] Shell View Handler #4616
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Essentials.OrientationSensor refactored to interface and singleton #4662
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Browser refactored to interface and singleton #4605
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Barometer refactored to interface and singleton #4604
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Annotate web Content items to avoid workarounds in Xamarin and iOS SDKs #4728
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Blazor Android/Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Windows] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4562
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Interfaced BorderHandler and CheckBoxHandler #4676
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Implement InputTransparent property #4513
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Essentials.Geolocation WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4634
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Core] Implement SizeChanged event #4541
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-general
  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Refactor Screenshot to use an interface #4699
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Email refactored to interface and singleton #4623
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.FilePicker WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4632
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Essentials.Gyroscope refactored to interface and singleton #4649
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Vibration refactored to interface and singleton #4727
    area/essentials 🍞
